page.title: 01SHANKLIN-BONCHURCH-LANDSLIP
page.content: The area is mostly countryside with some coast. There are three farms in the area Cliff Farm,Holme Farm and Wroxall Manor Farm.They have beef and dairy cattle and sheep.On the downs there are sheep,heather,gorse and the radar station.The down is very windy but on hot days it is very warm.The woodland area is called the{Landslip} it covers the south and east side of{ {St.Boniface Down.Shanklin}is a popular resort for holiday makers.They like it here because it is friendly,sunny and welcoming and there are lots of things to enjoy.{Shanklin}beach has nice clean sand but gets crowded in the Summer. Big Meade and Rylestone Gardens are two popular parks.Tourists like to visit the two old churches St. Blasius and Bonchurch Old Church.
